messages.content:
NAME: Sagar Thakur
EMAIL: sagarthakur4312@gmail.com
PHONE: +917317440237

FULL RESUME:
Sagar Thakur Email: sagarthakur4312@gmail.com
LinkedIn: sagar-thakur-223829259 Mobile: :+917317440237
Github: https://github.com/Matheletss
Education
• Birla Institute of Technology Mesra Ranchi, India
Integrated Master’s of Science - Mathematics & Computing 2022 - 2027 (Ongoing)
• Lucknow Public School Lucknow, India
CBSE - 12th Board; 92.2% 2022
• Lucknow Public School Lucknow, India
CBSE - 10th Board; 92.6% 2020
Experience
• The Linux Foundation India
Research Intern May 2024 - Current
o Worked on AI/ML use cases for Network Function Virtualization(NFV), focusing on optimizing and automating
network operations.
o Contributed to the Anuket project on data anonymization research, developing and evaluating techniques to protect
sensitive information while maintaining data utility.
o Used autoencoders to anonymize time-series and telecom data for secure classification, preserving privacy with
minimal impact on model performance.
• Chegg India India
Subject Matter Expert Feb 2023 - Oct 2023
o Provided expert insights and guidance on statistical concepts and methodologies. Answered complex queries from
students and educators, offering detailed explanations.
o Created solutions and instructional materials tailored to enhance learning outcomes. Contributed to the development of
high-quality resources for statistics education
PROJECTS/RESEARCH WORK
•
Paddy Disease Classification
o Developed a machine learning model utilizing Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) to accurately classify diseases
in paddy crops, enhancing disease detection and agricultural management.
• AI Interview Platform
o Created an AI-powered interview practice platform that simulates mock interviews, providing users with real-time
feedback and improving their interview preparation.
•
Application of Autoencoders for Anonymizing Telecom Data:
o A framework that applies autoencoders to anonymize telecommunication data (IP addresses, call detail records
(CDRs), serial numbers, and personal data, etc.) . The key contribution of this work was turning personally
identifiable information (PII) into anonymized data for research to allow release of valuable data to public while
following privacy and security procedures.
•
Multi-Objective Optimization of Tourist Carrying Capacity Using the Heuristic Approach
o This work proposed a multi-objective optimization framework applying NSGA-II to tourist carrying capacity
(TCC) evaluation. Unlike traditional evaluation methods, this framework optimizes environment, economy, social,
and infrastructure in a sustainable adaptive and efficient way. Destination managers could use this framework to
help solve complex, multi-dimensional problems in a sustainable fashion. This work Abstract is provisionally
accepted for book titled 'Decision Analytics for Tourism Planning and Management'
Leadership & Volunteer Experience
• Serving as the Vice President - Outreach for the Society for Data Science at BIT Mesra, I led and managed strategic initiatives
to strengthen the community's engagement and outreach. I played a pivotal role in organizing and executing eastern India’s
largest Data Science Summits in both 2023 and 2024.
•
These high-impact events attracted a diverse audience, including industry experts, academic professionals, and data
science enthusiasts, fostering a collaborative environment for knowledge sharing, skill development, and networking. My
leadership involved coordinating with industry partners, securing sponsorships, and managing large-scale event logistics
to ensure the success of these summits.
Skills
• General: Python, C/C++, Java, SQL, Docker, Git/GitHub
• Web Technologies: HTML/CSS
• Data Science & ML: TensorFlow/Keras, PyTorch, Scikit-Learn, TensorRT, R, Autoencoders, Supervised Learning, Unsupervised
Learning, Feature Engineering, Natural Language Processing, Model Evaluation & Tuning, Data
Preprocessing, and Ensemble Methods.
